ygData.subject: Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into character so... When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the
ygData.messageBody:
As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into
character so... When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: Everyday! (husband moved to Texas, I'm my own
woman once again!)

Time of day: afterwork weekdays, most of the weekend (note to self: hire a
maid)

Longest stretch of continuous play: 20 hours (Ghoulbane/Jboot camping is a
pain)

Way to have game sounds: very low so group can talk on BFC

Distance to sit from display: 2ft (21 monitor and new desk)

TV show to have on: cartoons for daughter

Music to listen to: Stabbing Westward: Darkest Days

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Iced Tea

Beverage (alcoholic): rare if ever

Health Food: ?? (I'm a lousy Mom, LOL)

Junk Food: gingerbread men, the stuff of life ;)

Clothes to wear: whatever I can get into quick, just realized I woke up late
for an early camp!



Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe (L34)
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur, Xegony
